scripts.require+: echo disabled node -p 'const { validate, is } = require("./index"); validate("str", "string");'
scripts.require-: echo disabled node -p 'const { validate, is } = require("./index"); validate("str", "int");'
scripts.import+: echo disabled node -r esm -p 'import { validate, is } from "./index"; validate("str", "string");'
scripts.import-: echo disabled node -r esm -p 'import { validate, is } from "./index"; validate("str", "int");'
